gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.converter

Class AbstractAvroToOrcConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.converter.Converter<Schema,Schema,QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity,QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity>
      • gobblin.data.management.conversion.hive.converter.AbstractAvroToOrcConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FinalState, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HiveAvroToFlattenedOrcConverter, HiveAvroToNestedOrcConverter

    public abstract class AbstractAvroToOrcConverter
extends Converter<Schema,Schema,QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity,QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity>
    Builds the Hive avro to ORC conversion query. The record type for this converter is QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity. A QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity can be a hive table or a hive partition.

    Concrete subclasses define the semantics of Avro to ORC conversion for a specific ORC format by providing ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfigs.

      • hasConversionConfig

        protected abstract boolean hasConversionConfig()

        This method is called by convertRecord(Schema, QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity, WorkUnitState) before building the conversion query. Subclasses can find out if conversion is enabled for their format by calling ConvertibleHiveDataset.getConversionConfigForFormat(String) on the hiveDataset.
        Available ORC formats are defined by the enum AbstractAvroToOrcConverter.OrcFormats

        If this method returns false, no Avro to to ORC conversion queries will be built for the ORC format.

        Returns:
        true if conversion is required. false otherwise

      • getConversionConfig

        protected abstract ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfig getConversionConfig()
        Get the ConvertibleHiveDataset.ConversionConfig required for building the Avro to ORC conversion query
        Returns:
        Conversion config

                                                       throws DataConversionException
        Populate the avro to orc conversion queries. The Queries will be added to QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity#getQueries()

      • getDropPartitionsDDLInfo

        public static List<Map<String,String>> getDropPartitionsDDLInfo(QueryBasedHiveConversionEntity conversionEntity)

      • getDropPartitionsDDLInfo

        public static List<Map<String,String>> getDropPartitionsDDLInfo(Partition hivePartition)
        Parse the REPLACED_PARTITIONS_HIVE_METASTORE_KEY from partition parameters to returns DDLs for all the partitions to be dropped.
        Returns:
        A List of partitions to be dropped. Each element of the list is a Map which maps a partition's key and value.
